# peripheralIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The Bluetooth identifier of the accessory to migrate.

## Declaration

```swift
var peripheralIdentifier: UUID? { get set }
```

## Accessory identifiers

- **hotspotSSID**: The Wi-Fi hotspot SSID of the accessory to migrate.
- **wifiAwarePairedDeviceID**: The Wi-Fi Aware paired device identififer of the accessory to migrate.
